description: Ubushye bushobora gukumirwa turinda abana kwegera umuriro, amashyiga, amazi ashyushye cyangwa amavuta n’ibiryo bishyushye kandi bakarindwa kwegera insinga z’amashanyarazi.
title: Ubushye bushobora gukumirwa turinda abana kwegera umuriro, amashyiga, amazi ashyushye cyangwa amavuta n’ibiryo bishyushye kandi bakarindwa kwegera insinga z’amashanyarazi.
content:
Ubushye bushobora gukumirwa turinda abana kwegera umuriro, amashyiga, amazi ashyushye cyangwa amavuta n’ibiryo bishyushye kandi bakarindwa kwegera insinga z’amashanyarazi.

Ubushye buri mu bintu byiganje biteza impanuka zikomeye ku bana bato. Akenshi butera inkovu zihoraho kandi rimwe na rimwe bishobora kuviramo umwana gupfa. Akenshi ariko ibi bishobora gukumirwa.
